isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Mounting Engine on Stand - Mounting Adapter Plate and Engine

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death or damage to the engine or vehicle use a minimum 3 ton chain hoist, equipped with safety hooks to lift the engine at designated lifting eyes.

To avoid serious personal injury, possible death or damage to the engine or vehicle, use only metric grade 10.9 or SAE grade 8 bolts when mounting adapter plate to engine as well as the engine stand. See instructional literature included with adapter plate for specific directions of its safe use.

step1.para: Visually match up adapter plate with bolt holes on right side of engine to determine adapter plate orientation to the engine stand.

figure.caption: Installing the adapter plate to engine stand

step1.para: Install recommended adapter plate to engine stand and secure by using eight (grade 8) bolts and nuts. Tighten bolts to the standard torque value.
